output-files.name: Output Directory
output-files.description: This is the directory where the overall outputs are to be stored.

inputs.name: bids_dir
inputs.description: the root folder of a BIDS valid dataset (sub-XXXXX folders should be found at the top level in this folder).

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: the output path for the outcomes of preprocessing and visual reports

inputs.name: analysis_level
inputs.description: processing stage to be run, only participant or group (see BIDS-Apps specification).

inputs.name: participant_label
inputs.description: a quoted comma-delimited list of participant identifiers or a single identifier

inputs.name: task_label
inputs.description: a quoted comma-delimited list of task identifiers or a single identifier

inputs.name: session_label
inputs.description: a quoted comma-delimited list of session identifiers or a single identifier

inputs.name: anat_only
inputs.description: run anatomical workflows only

inputs.name: rerun_if_complete
inputs.description: Will delete and rerun ciftify workflows if incomplete outputs are found

inputs.name: read_from_derivatives
inputs.description: Indicates pre-ciftify will be read from the indicated derivatives path and freesurfer/fmriprep will not be run

inputs.name: func_preproc_dirname
inputs.description: Name derivatives folder where func derivatives are found. Defaults to fmriprep

inputs.name: func_preproc_desc
inputs.description: The bids desc tag [default: preproc] assigned to the preprocessed file

inputs.name: older_fmriprep
inputs.description: Read from fmriprep derivatives that are version 1.1.8 or older

inputs.name: fmriprep_workdir
inputs.description: Path to working directory for fmriprep

inputs.name: freesurfer_license
inputs.description: Path to the freesurfer license file

inputs.name: Number of CPUs
inputs.description: Number of cpus available. Defaults to the valueof the OMP_NUM_THREADS environment variable or 1

inputs.name: Ignore Fieldmaps
inputs.description: Will ignore available fieldmaps and use syn-sdc for fmriprep

inputs.name: No Suseptability Distortion Correction
inputs.description: Will not do fmriprep distortion correction at all (NOT recommended)

inputs.name: Additional FMRIPREP ARGS
inputs.description: Additional user arguments that may be added to fmriprep stages

inputs.name: Output T1w32k
inputs.description: Output additional surfaces in fsLR32k Individual (T1w) Space

inputs.name: Surface Registration Algorigth
inputs.description: Registration sphere prefix [default: MSMSulc]

inputs.name: No symbolic linking
inputs.description: Will not create symbolic links to the zz_templates folder

inputs.name: Spatial Smoothing Full-Width-at-Half-Max
inputs.description: Full-Width-at-Half-Max for optional fmri cifti smoothing (mm)

inputs.name: MSM Config
inputs.description: EXPERT OPTION. The path to the configuration file to use for MSMSulc mode. By default, the configuration file. This setting is ignored when not running MSMSulc surface registration.

inputs.name: ciftify config
inputs.description: EXPERT OPTION. Path to a yaml configuration file. Overrides the default settings in ciftify/data/ciftify_workflow_settings.yaml

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.description: Increase logging level

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Run in very verbose debug level logging

invocation-schema.description: Invocation schema for bids app - fmriprep_ciftify.
invocation-schema.title: BIDS App - fmriprep_ciftify.invocationSchema

name: BIDS App - fmriprep_ciftify
description: Runs a combination of fmriprep and ciftify pipelines from BIDS specification
